subitem_name,
subitem_standard_min,

subitem_unit,
subitem_status,

mapper.update:
update phy_subitem
subitem_name = #{subitemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subitem_standard_min = #{subitemStandardMin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subitem_standard_max = #{subitemStandardMax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subitem_unit = #{subitemUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subitem_status = #{subitemStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where subitem_id = #{subitemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update phy_subitem set subitem_name = #{subitemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subitem_standard_min = #{subitemStandardMin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subitem_standard_max = #{subitemStandardMax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subitem_unit = #{subitemUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subitem_status = #{subitemStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where subitem_id = #{subitemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from phy_subitem where subitem_name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
